title: Bear Alpha Bride
description: Florence has had trouble keeping friends since childhood. She was never allowed to have sleepovers and her sisters used to pick on her. As an adult, she has found love with a younger human man named Ken. She canâ€™t help her unnatural ability to shift into a bear, but he doesn't scared. He wants to be with her no matter what and promises that together, they will overcome her shifting powers.
author: J.J.  Fox
